body:
For those who don't understand, they've developed a drug that, "as a contraceptive" prevents pregnancy by transforming sperm in the body into eggs to be removed from the body. It makes NO fucking sense at all, but hey, hentai!
For this to make sense, they would only be able to lay ONE egg a month, after all, so those eggs have to come from the sperm, not from the one actual ovum released by the fallopian tubes a month.
My question is where the fuck did the eggs come from
Jesus Christ, how many 100-200 page hentai is this artist gonna draw? This nigga is built different if he can draw this much.
